Boulder.Coors Events Center:
The Coors Events Center is an 11,064-seat multi-purpose arena in the western United States, on the main campus of the University of Colorado in Boulder, Colorado. Opened 38 years ago in 1979, it is home to the Colorado Buffaloes men's and women's basketball teams and women's volleyball of the Pac-12 Conference.
The building is an eight-sided concrete structure, with three levels: arena floor, service level, and the concourse level.
